title: Rattlesnake Road (A Dark and Intense Romantic Thriller) (The Road Series)
features: ♥ Named one of POPSUGAR's 12 Best Romance Books ♥★ Featured on the Today Show ★
From bestselling and multi-award-winning author Amanda McKinney comes her most evocative and
Welcome to 1314 Rattlesnake Road—the perfect hideaway to escape your past.

After leaving her posh NYC life behind, fashion editor Grey Dalton escapes to the small, southern town of Berry Springs to pick up the broken pieces of her life. On impulse, she purchases a rumored-to-be-haunted house where she finds herself thrown into decade-old murder mystery, and onto the rocky road of recovery and self-discovery. Men are the last thing on her mind—until she meets a tattooed cowboy and a dashing businessman. One will steal her heart, the other, her soul."A dark, edge-gripping emotional read." -
"Strong characterization bolsters this profound, romantic tale." -
"McKinney keeps it real, expertly balancing internal struggles and outside conflict while weaving tough situations into a beautiful love story."
(Due to serious subject matter and mature content, please be aware that this book might be an emotional trigger for some readers.)
